extendedInfo.description: No more looking out the window or freezing outside at the stop. CatchTheBus uses GPS trackers to give you an accurate prediction for when the Bus and T will be at your stop.This version of CatchTheBus provides real-time location information for Greater Boston Public Transportation / MBTA Bus Routes and T Lines.Enjoy!

reviews.title: Not pretty but useful
reviews.comment: It\'s not pretty, but gets the job done for a reasonable price. Having the list of stops in the right order would be a huge improvement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This would be a lot better if it worked. Developers need to Catch a Clue on simple table queries. Too many routes with No Data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs to be updated and refined
reviews.comment: I\'m making a new review. Had this app for a couple years and it worked great when it first came out. Now only a few main buses are accurate. The stops are way off. Some bus routes not even including major bus stations. Developers got lazy and need to update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has recently stopped working lately on my droid. Times are not updating properly. Hoping for an update soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is suck, took very long time to download and it not working. Waste time n money. Not my fav app so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just OK
reviews.comment: Does what I need it to do in terms of letting me know how long until my bus arrives. I wish the list of stops on a given route made sense - alphabetical or actual order (they seem random). Too easy to accidentally remove stops you have saved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It won\'t let me save my stops, I get an error message every time saying \'somethings wrong\'
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t usually work for me, but my husband used it all winter and it worked great for him. I think it depends what bus routes you take.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Much better since the updates with its directions finally sorted out. I use this all the time and only wish that the Green line will be added someday.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really love this app and it has been accurate up until thus week. Tracking is increasingly off 5-20 min. Dunno if that\'s an app issue or a T issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: By far the best app. So accurate that I\'m confident to wait to the last minute to go out and catch the bus. No more freezing or sweating my butt off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: UPDATE!!
reviews.comment: So far I\'m loving this app had it for about a year but haven\'t gotten a single update =\\ ... WHEN ARE WE GETTING AN UPDATE DAMMIT ??!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome App, it now has Orange & Red Line subway data! Wish it covered the Green Line, though I\'m not even sure the MBTA knows where those trains are.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well for red line and ct1 - but ct1 stops are not in order and some do not have same names as mbta schedule, so it\'s a bit confusing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I have galaxy s 1
reviews.comment: The list of stops should b updated.. its hard to follow and illogical. Sometimes the times are completely off.. But when times are accurate, this ap makes life easier
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Essential
reviews.comment: Works well on my phone, accurate. Suggestions though:  - Put stops in order - Make it clearer which stop is going in which direction. For example, the two stops across the street from each other are labeled the same, you have to click on each one to see the direction it\'s going.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why u no have map?
reviews.comment: Helpful, but the interface is horrible. Searching a list that is in seemingly random order is a waste of time, enough to not be worth using.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Decent at times, but its off by about 5 minutes today! Train times need to work too. Worth about .50\302\242, not $2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very helpful makes going to work so much easier
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Generally good
reviews.comment: Usually works well.  As long as you understand the whole inbound/ outbound thing you can fiugre out the routes.  Would be nice to have the green line.  MOSTLY on time but occasionally says bus has already come thru stop and it hasn\'t yet which REALLY sucks but it\'s getting better.  It\'s better than NOT having the app
reviews.author: A Google User
